Spells -- Male Tuomi Human Heroic Adventurer
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d12 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d6 Strength: d8 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes: Necromantic Weakness: -2 vs. undead effects
Skills (18 Points):
Climbing: (str) d6 Knowledge (Battle): (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d10
Hrimwisardry: (sma) d4 Knowledge (Folklore): (sma) d4+1 Song Magic: (sma) d8
Investigation: (sma) d4 Lockpicking: (agi) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d8
Languages: Tuomi
Skill Notes:
Arcane Background (Song Magic): +1 Common Knowledge/+1 Charisma/+1 Knowledge (Folklore)/+1 Knowledge (History)/+1 Knowledge (Riddles)
Attractive: +2 Charisma
Charisma: +3 Persuasion/+3 Streetwise
Bad Eyes+: -2 on distant visual Trait rolls and ranged attacks
Size: 0 Deity: Hoenir
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 29 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 12; Skill: 3
Description Notes: Diverse: +2 Improvement Points (edge or skills)
Features
Edges (6 points): Arcane Background (Song Magic); Attractive; Beast Bond; Quick; Rich; Streetwise Hindrances: Bad Eyes+; Necromantic Weakness Tuomi Human Abilities: Diverse
Feature Notes:
Beast Bond: May spend Bennies on companion animals
Rich: 3x starting funds
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (0) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Quick: May redraw Action Cards lower than 6
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 10
Powers:
Aim: (1 PP) RTouch Target gains +2 attack (Raise +4) w/thrown or missile weapon while maintained
Altered Senses: (1 PP) RTouch Target gains Infravision or Low Light Vision feature (Raise both) while maintained
Analyze Foe: (1 PP) RSight Self knows the number of edges and highest attack skill of target (Raise names of edges and attack skill dice)
Animate War Tree: (8 PP) RTouch Target 30'-high tree animates (Raise as Wild Card) while maintained
Arcane Resistance: (1 PP) RTouch Foes suffer -2 (Raise -4) on arcane attacks and damage against target while maintained
Aura: (4 PP) RTouch Creatures adjacent to target suffer 2d6 damage while maintained
Banish: (3 PP) R6" Target returns to native plane (Spirit neg)
Battle Song: (2 PP) R2" Creatures in range gain Berserk feature (Spirit neg) while maintained
Beast Friend: (3+2xSize PP) R400" Target can speak with and control beast actions for 10 min
Becalm: (3 PP) RSight Target ship suffers half speed while maintained
Bladebreaker: (2 PP) R8" Target weapon destroyed (Weapon die type neg)
Blast: (2 PP) R24" 2" radius inflicts 2d6 damage
Bless/Panic: (1 PP) R6" Allies in range gain +2 Spirit (or foes suffer -2) vs. fear (Raise +4/-4) while maintained
Bodyguard: (3 PP) R8" Creates an obedient servant until wounded
Bolt: (1/missile PP) R12" Inflicts 2d6 damage
Bridge: (1/Section PP) R8" Creates sections of 1" horizontal surface while maintained
Champion Of The Faith: (2 PP) RSelf Target gains Champion or Holy Warrior feature while maintained
Charismatic Aura: (1 PP) RSelf Target gains +1 Charisma (Raise +2) while maintained
Confusion: (1 PP) R16" Target suffers -2 Trait rolls (Raise -4) (Smarts neg) while maintained
Corpse Senses: (2 PP) R400" Self may use corpse senses while maintained
Detect/Conceal: (2 PP) R16" Target can detect the presence of supernatural effects or conceals target aura while maintained
Disease: (3 PP) R6" Target suffers disease and fatigue; may die (Vigor neg)
Elemental Form: (5 PP) RSelf Gains elemental form special abilities while maintained
Energy Immunity: (2 PP) RTouch Target takes half damage (Raise no damage) from chosen energy attack while maintained
Enhance Undead: (3 PP) RTouch Undead targets gain advancement benefit for 1 hr (Raise 6 hr; 2 Raises 1 dy)
Entangle: (2 PP) R8" Impedes target (Raise binds) (Agility neg, Agility or Strength ends)
Farsight: (3 PP) RTouch Target gains +2 Notice within 16" and sees up to 5 miles while maintained
Fatigue: (3 PP) R12" 2" radius (Raise 3") inflicts fatigue (Vigor neg)
Feast: (2 PP) R8" Creates 20 lb of basic food
Fog Cloud: (3 PP) RSelf 4 mile fog reduces lighting 1 step (Raise 2 steps) while maintained
Fortune's Favored: (1 PP) RTouch Target may reroll failed Benny-purchased reroll while maintained
Gift Of Battle: (2 PP) RTouch Target gains choice of leadership edge (Raise 2 edges) while maintained
Glyph: (4 PP) RTouch Glyph stores spell effects until triggered
Gravespeak: (3 PP) RTouch Target may ask a spirit 6 questions
Greater Zombie: (4 PP) R12" Target corpse animates and obeys self commands for 1 hr
Growth/Shrink: (2/Size PP) R8" Target gains or loses Toughness and 1 Strength Step (Spirit neg) for 3 rd
Heat Mask: (1 PP) RTouch Target remains invisible to infravision while maintained
Insight: (1 PP) RTouch Self sees 1 event that occurred recently to touched object
Knockdown: (2 PP) R9" Cone pushes creatures 1d4" and knocks prone (Strength neg)
Leaping: (1 PP) RTouch Target gains dbl jumping distance (Raise x4) while maintained
Lock/Unlock: (1 PP) RTouch Target lock gains -2 pick penalty and +2 Toughness (Raise -4 and +4) until unlocked or unlocks normal lock
Luck/Jinx: (3 PP) RTouch Target takes the better/worse of two Trait rolls while maintained
Mend: (3 PP) RTouch Target wooden vehicle recovers 1 Wound (Raise 2) suffered in the past hr
Mimic: (3 PP) R6" Self can cast spell used by another while maintained
Mind Rider: (3 PP) R8" Self can use target's senses (Spirit neg) while maintained
Negate Arcana: (5 PP) R8" 2" radius dispels all magic while maintained
Nightmare: (3 PP) RSelf Target w/in 8 miles loses benefits of sleep and becomes frightened (Spirit neg)
Precognition: (2 PP) RSelf Allows rearranging 2 Action Cards (Raise 4) next rd
Prolonged Blast: (5 PP) R24" Choice of 1" or 2" radius inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) while maintained
Quake: (6 PP) R24" 3" radius inflicts 2d10 damage (Agility neg)
Refuge: (3 PP) R8" Creates a 10'x6' shelter that gives +2 Vigor vs. cold (Raise +4) for 12 hr
Regenerate: (3 PP) RTouch Target gains free -2 Soak roll (Raise -0) while maintained
Sacrifice: (5 PP) RSelf Gives +1 arcane skill per victim Spirit step while maintained
Sanctuary: (3 PP) RSelf Teleports to a safe location
Sentry: (3 PP) R16" Creates an overnight ghostly sentry or object alarm
Shape Change: (3+ PP) RSelf Transforms into animal form for 1 min
Silence: (1 PP) RTouch Mutes 2" radius while maintained
Sluggish Reflexes: (2 PP) R16" Target draws 1 fewer Action Card or takes the lower of 2 cards (Spirit neg) while maintained
Slumber: (2 PP) R16" Target sleeps for 1 hr (Spirit neg)
Sphere Of Might: (4 PP) R8" 1" sphere around target inflicts -1 attacks (Raise -2) and attacks as d8 in Fighting, inflicting d8+d4 damage (Raise d8+d8) while maintained
Storm: (5 PP) RSelf Creates or dissipates 10 mile lightning storm or blizzard while maintained

Succor: (1 PP) RTouch Target recovers from 1 level of fatigue (Raise 2 levels)

Viper Weapon: (2 PP) R16" Transforms target weapon into a viper while maintained
Voice On The Wind: (2 PP) RSelf Transmits 30-word message up to 400 miles to known target
Wall Walker: (2 PP) R8" Target may move at full Pace on vertical and inverted surfaces while maintained
Wandering Senses: (2 PP) R80" Self senses remotely while maintained
Warding: (5 PP) RSelf 2" radius (Raise 3" radius) bars specified creature type while maintained
Warrior's Gift: (4 PP) RTouch Target gains combat edge effects (Raise improved version) for 3 rd
Water Walk: (2 PP) RTouch Target may traverse calm water while maintained
Weaken Undead: (3 PP) R6" Target undead loses undead ability (Spirit neg) while maintained
Weapon Immunity: (3 PP) RTouch Target takes half damage (Raise no damage) from specified weapon type while maintained
Whirlwind: (2 PP) R8" 2" radius knocks prone (Strength neg)
Wilderness Step: (1 PP) RTouch Target treats all terrain as normal while maintained
Zephyr: (2 PP) RSelf Creates a moderate wind while maintained
